channel.title: [pi] Help with making a point system
channel.description: I need help with making a minigame for Dragons and I need help with the making a point system. Like for Green-Black you get one point. Bronze-Steel you get two, and Frost you get 3. I have almost no clue how to do this. I know how to make an npc give you points, but i need to know how to add the point system so they can give you the points. Point me to a tut or Just help me out here. Thanks for any help.

item.title: [pi] Help with making a point system
item.dc:creator: @Dario14 Dario14
item.description:
@Dario14 wrote:

Go to NPCHandler.java and add something along the lines of this

if (npcs[i].npcType == ###) { c.$$$$$ += @@@; }

npc id

@@@ point ammound
$$$ the name of the point system for example, KC, DC, pkPoint, dungPoints.

Read full topic
item.source: [pi] Help with making a point system
